Name: Vacant
Job/Team Function: Accountable to the Permanent Under Secretary and is the designated budget holder of DIO. Chief Executive (CE) is responsible for the delivery of coherent and affordable solutions to meet Defence needs through the provision of an effective, efficient, safe, legal and sustainable infrastructure. Responsible for the delivery of running cost reductions and exploration of commercialisation opportunities in line with Strategic Defence and Security Review (SDSR), Public Accounts Committee (PAC) and Defence Reform recommendations. Chairs the Defence Infrastructure Board (DIB) and the Executive Committee of the Defence Infrastructure Board (ECIB).
Notes: Vacant since 31/03/16

Name: Richard McKinney
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Chief Operating officer responsible for the delivery of Service Family Accommodation (SFA) and Single Living Accommodation (SLA) for re-basing of HM Forces from Germany to UK.
Notes: Temporary promotion

Name: Leo O'Shea
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Chief Operating Officer and responsible for service delivery across the defence estate (UK and overseas) including the volunteer estate, service family homes, major training areas and the MOD Guard Service (MGS). Responsible for delivering agreed and funded total facilities management services and estate improvement through a variety of contractual arrangements. Member of the DIB, SLT and DIO Investment Approvals Committee (DIO IAC). Chairs the Service Delivery Committee (SDC).
Notes: Employee of Strategic Business Partner - salary costs paid through SBP Contract

Name: Geoff Robson
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Chief Operating Officer and responsible for ensuring the entirety of the Operational requirement for the command environments is captured, tested, planned for and programmed. Acts as Military specialist to advise on the infrastructure Defence Lines of Development (DLoD) requirements. Steers strategy/policy in the context of the effective utilisation, rationalisation and commercialisation of Defence infrastructure and drives the Footprint Strategy to determine basing solutions for FF2020. Member of the DIB, ECIB and DIO IAC.
Notes: Employee of Strategic Business Partner - salary costs paid through SBP Contract

Name: David Billingham
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Director T&C and responsible for the functions which enable the DIO to have the right staff, in the right place with the right skills to deliver its outputs both now and in the future. Member of the DIO SLT.
Notes: Employee of Strategic Business Partner - salary costs paid through SBP Contract

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Director PPD and responsible for the management of property, infrastructure and related services to ensure strategic management of the Defence Estate, optimising investment, and enabling military capability and Defence outputs to best effect. Responsible for the delivery of all routine and Basing infrastructure capital investment programmes and associated projects, together with property disposals and acquisitions across the Infrastructure DLoD. Engagement with senior industry partners and overseeing supplier relationships (Principle Support Providers and Contractors), providing strategic oversight and performance management. Member of the ECIB. Chairs the Projects Delivery Committee.

Name: N/D

Name: N/D
Job Title: Head Service Delivery - Total Facilities Management
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Director SD and responsible for managing the delivery of FM contracts within the UK. Responsibilities include Hard & Soft FM, infrastructure PFIs and FM contracts which support United States Visiting Forces (USVF). Member of the SDC.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Director Finance and responsible for delivering a Footprint Strategy that determines the right sized, fit for purpose and affordable infrastructure to support the delivery of Future Force 2020 (FF2020). Development of a strategic laydown plan that reflects the new structures of Command environments including the return of the Army from Germany and the Future Reserves structures. Regard to the current and future utilisation of the estate and the funding and phasing of transition against the delivery of both MOD and wider Government policy and targets.

Name: N/D
Job/Team Function: Accountable to Director Finance and responsible for process, information and design of the DIO’s Operating Model. Member of the ECIB.
